name: Short Giraffe
description:
Short Giraffe is a physics based 2D plaformer where you play as Agent G, a secret agent giraffe with a robotic, extendable neck. Extend and retract your neck to swing, interact, and traverse your way through levels while defeating the Meerkat menace.
